original: 山東人，客三輔。漢末三國時隱士、方士，曉知星曆、風角、鳥情。三輔大亂時，先南入漢中，劉備占領漢中後，青牛先生入蜀。此後不知下落。
text: Shandong native, guest third assistant. At the end of the Han Dynasty, the three kingdoms were hermits and alchemists, who knew the astrological calendar, wind angles and bird love. During the Sanfu upheaval, he first entered Hanzhong from the south, and after Liu Bei occupied Hanzhong, Mr. Qingniu entered Shu. After that, his whereabouts were unknown.
